Columbia Council of Camp Fire Girls
Elvira Building Columbia, Missouri
div1.p: Bless your heart for all the time you spent with our Blue Birds and Camp Fire Girls last June 2nd. Nor can I leave out mention of us so-called adults. All of us were spellbound with your account of your life and adventures with the Sioux Indians. We were all especially inspired with the way you told of them. Indeed, it was a privilege for everone there that afternoon and an experience none of us will ever forget. We all hope that perhaps sometime during next year's day camp you'll make a return visit to us.
Bill and I are still looking forward to coming by to see you in the country -- and to see those horses we've heard so much about.
In the meantime, all of the best of good wishes to you. Again, our deepenst thanks for being with us; your visit was indeed the big high point of this year's day camp.

closer.signed:
Virginia Cragen
Mrs. William C. Cragen
Day Camp Director
